mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fboard(fboardno, memberno, ftitle, fcontent, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, youtube) VALUES(fboard_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{ftitle}, #{fcontent}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{youtube})
mapper.select: SELECT fboardno, memberno, ftitle, fcontent, rdate, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, views, replycnt FROM fboard ORDER BY fboardno DESC

SELECT fboardno, memberno, ftitle, fcontent, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, views FROM fboard
WHERE ftitle=#{ftitle}
WHERE UPPER(ftitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(fcontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY fboardno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM fboard
WHERE UPPER(ftitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(fcontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
